products.facilitation_text: We make the work easier so that the distance
products.analysis_distance: between you and your analysis is
products.search_as_you_want: Search for data as you wish
products.search_description: There are several filters to help you find the data you need. As you navigate through hundreds of datasets available on the platform, you can refine your search by theme, organization, time coverage, observation level, and more.
products.processed_tables_description: With the processed tables from our public data lake, you no longer need to spend hours cleaning datasets. Our standardization methodology allows you to easily cross-reference data from different organizations. This way, you can focus on what really matters.
products.packages_description: We have developed packages for accessing processed data in Python, R, and command line. Additionally, you can query and filter data using SQL in our public data lake editor on Google BigQuery.

support.existence_through_effort: We exist through the effort of people who
support.those_who_believe_in_quality_open_data: believe in access to quality open data.
support.enthusiast_description: day to help us maintain the initiative.
support.master_of_data_description: Less than R$2 per day to save you even more work.
support.step_3: Scan the QR Code or enter the key on the side;
